total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the non-zero numbers in the input grid.
Q2: For each non-zero number, find the corresponding number in the same column but different row.
Q3: Replace the zero numbers in the column between the two non-zero numbers with the smaller non-zero number.
Q4: Repeat Q2 and Q3 for all non-zero numbers identified in Q1.
